definition: "roof" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 40), occurring in 家, 定, 安 etc/see also 寶蓋|宝盖[bao3 gai4]
sensationalism/vulgar claptrap to please the crowds/playing to the gallery/demagogy
overwhelmed by favor from superior (humble expr.)
(old) (esp. of the Emperor) to show special favor towards
special favor from a ruler/Emperor's generosity towards a favorite
double income family who have pets rather than children (see also 丁克[ding1 ke4])

sentences.english: Nowaddays parents bring up their children too leniently .
sentences.chinese: 现在的父母都太宠小孩了。

sentences.english: His father knew it , but his grandma doted on him.
sentences.chinese: 他的父亲知道这一点，可他的阿公母仍然宠着他。

sentences.english: His father knew it, but his grandma doted on him.
sentences.chinese: 他的父亲知道这一点，可他的祖父母仍然宠着他。

sentences.english: But what about loving your pet to death?
sentences.chinese: 但是，如果你对自己的宠特爱得要死，怎么办？

sentences.english: Do not spoil them through your home page. Tease.
sentences.chinese: 不要用你的首页来宠溺他们，记住。

sentences.english: In the gentle romance can only use your spoiled to replace.
sentences.chinese: 在温柔的情陷上只能用你的宠溺来替代。

sentences.english: Do his parents tend to baby him and help him out of financial jams?
sentences.chinese: 他的父母一直宠着他，并且帮助他脱离经济困境吗？

sentences.english: Small-size pet takes one bag per meal.
sentences.chinese: 体型小的爱宠每餐一包。

sentences.english: Li Xin is a good teacher not only because she has a good way of teaching, but also because she loves her students and never spoil them.
sentences.chinese: 李欣不仅教学方法不错，而且爱却不宠学生。

sentences.english: It is also a fun way to interactively play and bond with your new puppy.
sentences.chinese: 这也是一个您与您的爱宠交流的好方法。

sentences.english: Don't pamperdamp scamp tramps that camp under ramp lamps.
sentences.chinese: 要宠潮湿恶棍流浪汉营地下坡道灯。

sentences.english: This product smell pleasantly, make your pet enjoy the bathing.
sentences.chinese: 本品香味怡人，令爱宠在沉醉于沐浴的乐趣之中。

sentences.english: I could be your blue eyed angel.
sentences.chinese: 我可以是你宠溺的纯真天使。

sentences.english: You can name your animal companions and familiars .
sentences.chinese: 你能为动物伙伴和魔宠命名。

definition: to drown/to indulge/addicted to/to spoil (a child)
lit. little princess/fig. spoiled girl/female version of 小皇帝[xiao3 huang2 di4]
to act like a spoiled child/to throw a tantrum/to act coquettishly
Master (term used by servant)/Your Majesty/operator (of machine)
to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth
to do what one is told/obedient
(coll.) presenting as unfriendly and blunt, but warm and tender inside (loanword from Japanese "tsundere")
